page.title: 13HEALTH GLASGOW SOUTH
page.content: There are three large hospitals in our area. Two of them are primarily concerned with{Psychiatric care}and one is a more general hospital. None of these hospitals has a casualty or accident unit. {Leverndale Hospital}caters for{ {psychiatric,mentally disturbed patients.It is situated in southern Glasgow and takes its patients from Paisley to Lanarkshire.The population of this area is 380,000.This hospital has 996 beds which are occupied all year round.75% ofthe patients are long stay patients.At present new buildings are being built and in future the number of patients will decline to 600. The hospital has a clothes shop,a cafeteria,library, laundry for the patients. There is an{Industrial {centre}to rehabilitate patients.
